Reviews.Title: Cheap but it works fantastic!
Reviews.Author: stevenE
Reviews.Content: I was a little bit worried about this product for the price but after using it for awhile I was shocked by how good it picks up police radars! Not a waste of money at all!!!

Reviews.Title: Good for everyday driving
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: I got this over a year ago, and since then, it has helped me a lot. For example, I'll be driving to class at night this thing alerts me of a cop a 1/2 mile away in either direction. There are times I cannot see them but this thing can, so I'm grateful for purchasing this. The only reason I gave it a four-star is sometimes it does not detect all police scanners. It does however track automatic doors and those speed camera that displays your speed out on the road. I leave it set on to city driving since majority of my driving is on the side streets.

Reviews.Title: Great product.
Reviews.Author: echick80
Reviews.Content: I bought this for our son for christmas. He travels back and forth between home and school. Says it works great and loves it.

Reviews.Title: Cobra fan
Reviews.Author: R. Molina
Reviews.Content: I own a cobra for a long time.  I purchased this for my husband's car.  Unfortunately the screen is very dim.

Reviews.Title: would buy again.
Reviews.Author: micalwilyems
Reviews.Content: I liked the compact size and weight which is great for my hard wired installation. The volume in alert mode is VERY weak. The good thing about the weak voulme is that it makes the false alerts less annoying.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Lance Degenstein
Reviews.Content: Works great, I had about a half mile warning around some hills. As long as their radar is on it works well for the price.

Reviews.Title: Awesome little device.
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a last minute decision to go on a 2000 mile trip down to Florida and South Carolina.  Yes it does have some false alarms, but heck who cares.  Me and wife loved hearing the sound and slamming on our brakes because we thought it was a cop.  We kidding around saying  "WOW were going to break even - we are going to need new brakes because every time we heard it beep.I would recommend it to anyone.  Also who ever say's the suction cup mount doesn't work.  I mounted it for 2000 miles and it never moved.

Reviews.Title: Radar detector
Reviews.Author: Jimmy W. De Marco "JimmyD5"
Reviews.Content: This is the best detector I have ever had.  The price was very reasonable, the range is great, 360 degree coverage. The mute function is great, automatically turns mute off when a new item is detected. I'm very pleased with the performance.J. DeMarcoNew Mexico

Reviews.Title: Great Radar
Reviews.Author: CJ
Reviews.Content: Awesome, this little gadget saved me from many super troopers radar. The only time it didn't was when i got caught with laser in New Hampshire, but it did give me enough warning to let me slow down of which I'm extremely thankful. I highly recommend cobra, good bang for your buck.

Reviews.Title: Decent Product For The Price
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: Product was very inexpensive, but performs as advertised. Clearly not a top of the line detector, but it is sufficient for my needs.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: BRANDON
Reviews.Content: it works wonderful helped me get away from being stopped by the cops a few time when joy ridin with buds

Reviews.Title: Well worth the price.
Reviews.Author: Stephan Hofmann
Reviews.Content: I wasn't too sure about this unit, especially considering the price. But after some "testing", it is truly worth every penny and more.Pros:This unit does pick up all the common (and to my knowledge, only) frequencies/bands used by police. It picks up the speed traps that tell you how fast you're going. My local PD uses laser, it picks it up. I've been on the highway and picked up a really strong Ka Band. Looked around, saw nothing and thought it was a false alarm. Sure enough, a little bit later, a unit sitting in the median. It had picked up the signal way before I was in view of the car. The buttons are responsive and it gives you tones to let you know you turned that feature on or off. Adjustable volume, I usually keep it at 9 or 10 (I usually listen to music and drive a loud car). Overall, very impressed.Cons:This does get a fair enough number of false hits. Every time I drive by a local bank, it alerts to X band. I generally disregard the X and K band, as most police are now using the Ka and Laser/Lidar systems. And false alerts are going to be an issue with every radar detector not equipped with GPS. Also the display is worse than useless if the sun is directly on it. But for the price, you cannot go wrong with this unit.Random info:I have it hardwired to turn on with the car. It's mounted on the dash with double stick tape, centered, that way it has a clear view of the front and back window, and i dont have to worry about the suction cups ever coming off the windshield.

Reviews.Title: Breaking the Law, Breaking the Law
Reviews.Author: HeatherLynn
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my BF for Valentines day (Romantic I know)....does it guarantee 100% protection from advancing technology used by police officers?  NO.  But has it more than once saved him from an avoidable ticket...YEP!It pays for itself the first time it warns you to slow down!I have an older model of this brand, and it has saved my butt more times than I dare admit to speeding! :)Happy Law BreakingHeather Lynn Osting - Author[...]

Reviews.Title: Radar detector, not a cop detector
Reviews.Author: Mx
Reviews.Content: Works well. Plenty of sound, easy to read display. People need to realize this is a RADAR detector, not a cop detector. If a cop isn't running radar, don't be surprised to pass him and NOT have your radar detector go off. That doesn't mean it isn't working.My only "complaint" is that it seems to find every Walgreens or CVS in my area before I can even see it. I get LOTS of false alarms even with city mode on, but it's still better than nothing - especially on the highway during long drives.P.S. YOU DO NOT NEED POP DETECTION MODE ON RADAR DETECTORS - they are very rarely used (in the U.S.).

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: C.C.
Reviews.Content: Purchased this item to replace an old one. First of all you get what you pay for....it's ok...The Led lights even on the highest setting can be dull because during the day you can barely see that its on...its ok at night. The alert sound comes in strong but after 2 or 3 times the volume goes down. The prior one I had before was brightly lit and loud enough to alert you anytime so to compare...its ok for the price....it does the job....

Reviews.Title: Cobra Radar/Laser Detector
Reviews.Author: Dorothy Young "Mom Mom"
Reviews.Content: I give this a 5 star rating because its a Cobra product which it top of the line. I recommend this product to everyone, it works great and can keep you alert to radar/laser traps.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Roger Dunn
Reviews.Content: I purchased this unit specifically for testing only, to see how it would compare to the other end of the spectrum, the Escort Redline. I ran several tests against a fixed Ka band radar source, and the Cobra ESD7570 did detect the radar, but only when direct line-of-sight, and at approximately 1/4 mile distant. The Cobra was unable to detect this same radar source from the rear, at a distance of more than 150 feet.For those who cannot afford anything better, this is, as they say "better than nothing", but is probably unlikely to keep you from getting cited, if you are the type who drives over the speed limit. It would be useful, however, for "situational awareness" when you are not at risk for getting a speeding ticket.Driving a car costs money. The car itself, gasoline, tires, maintenance, insurance. If you really want protection from a speeding ticket, save a bit more money and go to the next level radar detector, Whistler brand.

Reviews.Title: No More Tickets
Reviews.Author: Doriehi
Reviews.Content: I don't speed but it's always nice to know where the police are just in case I need them for something. It warms/alerts me every time.

Reviews.Title: This thing is on drugs.
Reviews.Author: Matthew L
Reviews.Content: I was really excited about this product especially since it was very cheap and most of the reviews were positive, but boy does this thing not work at all. I have driven by 4 cop cars with the radar detector on and it didn't pick up any signal from them. Then I pulled into my drive way where there were no cars around me at all, and it constantly picks up some signal that doesn't exist. This does not work, you get what you pay for. Spend more on a better radar detector.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy!
Reviews.Author: Rita Espinoza
Reviews.Content: I love this little radar it saved me from getting a ticket on the 2nd day I had it! Works well for the price! If your looking for an inexpensive radar that works I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: excellent buy
Reviews.Author: Joshua robinson
Reviews.Content: Works great! It's exactly what I was expecting and exactly what I wanted. Saved me from a ticket several times.

Reviews.Title: Bulb
Reviews.Author: mardysammadrid
Reviews.Content: The bulb of this radar detector is too dim. You cannot even see it when its day time. Not too happy with it :(

Reviews.Title: Worth every penny!
Reviews.Author: Colton Stagg
Reviews.Content: Not much to say about something so brilliantly simple!It's affordable, and it reliably alerts you of radar signals within a reasonable distance. Definitely not a Valentine or the like, but when you're just looking for a bit of security, you can trust this Cobra will keep you posted.Disclaimer: Do not exceed the speed limits on public roadways. I do not condone dangerous or illegal driving.

Reviews.Title: bang for your buck!
Reviews.Author: Alok Igoor
Reviews.Content: Went on a 14 hour long drive and back immediately after I picked it up and it certainly works it's magic. Easily saved me a lot of money on potential tickets!

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Richard A Drennan "R Drennan"
Reviews.Content: Has great range, better than other detectors I have tried but does not play we'll with other detectors. I tried it in my truck as a test (this one was bought for my motorcycle) and it causes my trucks detector to go crazy. I Gus's it was jealous.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Resha
Reviews.Content: I do a lot of traveling so I need a good system. It works amazingly I've dodged a lot of tickets with this baby. I wish the alert time was better, but I still love it.

Reviews.Title: Works OK, However Unreadable Display Except At Night
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: I have four other 6 Band Cobra units to compare this one with. I would not recommend based on display and RF emmissions.Unit will do the job and has a VG-2 alert but I can not verifiy that it works. Just traveled across country and back with this and an older Cobra.The display on this unit is unusable in day light even on an overcast day in the rain. The power indicator is barely perceptable if you know where to look. Forget seeing the other alert lights in daylight. So the "UltraBright data display" advertised could not be further from the truth.  Maybe I got an over tinted screen that should have been rejected  My other Cobra 6 Band detectors have bright light displays even in direct sunlight. Audio alerts are not as loud as older Cobras but OK.Unit is advertised as "Spectre I Undetectable" and "VG-2 Undetectable", I can't disprove this but when running another Cobra out the back of my vehicle and the Cobra ESD7570 out the front, the rear Cobra would do a constant alert on the ESD7570. I'm a licensed Ham radio operator and yes all receivers emit radio frequency emmissions. So, can the Cops detect your unit? Don't know, probably not an issue unless you are a trucker or live in Virginia ( no dectectors allowed). A pity I can't see the neat display during the day.

Reviews.Title: cop pointed his lazer right at me and no alert
Reviews.Author: Justin Rubio
Reviews.Content: the only thing this is good for it that it keeps me aware of if im speeding or not by randomly making noise. the few times it did pick up a cop radar i could already see the cop. For $40 it will help you not speed but if you want to speed buy a better one!

Reviews.Title: Nice little detector
Reviews.Author: just another user
Reviews.Content: It works well however even when kept on the city mode, it still beeps in unlikely places. However good value for money.

Reviews.Title: Beeps
Reviews.Author: durtytoolbag365
Reviews.Content: Works good for me. I live in a area where "they" don't use laser. It does pick up nuisance alarms. But again the area I live in does not produce many nuisance alarms.

Reviews.Title: Decoration !
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Garvin
Reviews.Content: This thing only picks up traffic signals or unless the cop is on the hood .Worthless device i must say!

Reviews.Title: perfect little gadget
Reviews.Author: liz smith
Reviews.Content: I like it, thank you its perfect and just what I needed. It works very well and I'm happy with it

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: J. Forness "A. Forness,"
Reviews.Content: There are better radar detectors out there, but for the price it seems to do the job.  As some say, the alarms are not that loud.  I have not had it long, but it alarms when it needs to.

Reviews.Title: decent
Reviews.Author: Yack
Reviews.Content: I rated this product three stars because, first off when it does trigger a cop car or convinent store its loud for the first second or two. Unless I have people in my car my music is usually loud. With that being said I usually see the cop before I hear the radar. I have had past radars before they stayed loud and I could hear them regardless my music. Also it wasnt a high dollar radar maybe $40, I could be doing something wrong but I keep my volume turned to ten and still only alerts on ten for maybe a second.

Reviews.Title: Quit working under 2 months
Reviews.Author: Iana
Reviews.Content: I bought this item on February 12th and it was working great. Then before April came around it quit beeping and picking up radar signals. It lights up and everything but no beeping noise even it the volume on 10. Thought it was just that there were no cops around but they were there.. in full effect!!Tried to return but returns date ended on March 18th...So I guess I am out of luck with this purchase :(

Reviews.Title: worth the $
Reviews.Author: great8
Reviews.Content: Worked like a charm. I drive 8 hours at a time and this is a little assurance when clicking off the miles on my commute.  I hard wired it to a power source above my windshield so there are no cords. You can barely tell its there. And the price you cant beat.

Reviews.Title: My Radar
Reviews.Author: Juan R.
Reviews.Content: My Radar, up to the moment, it is working as designed.  Still have to get use to identify different bands on the road so may provide more feedback later.  Nice package and fast delivery.

Reviews.Title: Nice unit
Reviews.Author: Daniel J Smith
Reviews.Content: This is so EASY to use, and it has saved me so many times. GREAT PRICE and I LOve it

Reviews.Title: Has already saved my a**
Reviews.Author: Brent Mostowy
Reviews.Content: Has already saved me from tickets, and therefor paid for itself. Would definitely recommend to any motorist. Works best outside cities, however.

Reviews.Title: Cobra Radar Detector
Reviews.Author: Alicia Childress
Reviews.Content: Loved this item! Works great. Can detect cops from a half mile away! The only thing I disliked was that the lights could be brighter. Other than that it's a great item. Does exactly what it says it will do.

Reviews.Title: work good
Reviews.Author: kenn
Reviews.Content: work as good as it said but did not try whit NVHP YET  . it  pick up every signal around , did not try on hightway yet.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: Spencer Headley
Reviews.Content: I have been driving with it for a couple days now and have not got any false alarms. I have got 3 alarms so far and have past 3 police cars. It lets you know about 1000 feet before you see the cop. Works as intended. Great for the price

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Florangel A. Cardenas
Reviews.Content: Awesome! I really liked the product it is worth it! And it works perfectly fine! And I'm loving it.... Strongly recommend

Reviews.Title: It goes off constantly
Reviews.Author: twitterisfortwits
Reviews.Content: I may get one to stop me from speeding. A friend had one and it went off about every mile or so and there was no cop anywhere near. It made me so paranoid, I slowed down. I am just afraid that eventually I will ignore it and get zapped!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Mark Twain
Reviews.Content: I'm using it for a while now, and can't be happier. Detector is very sensitive and detects police radars when there is still enough time to react. Moreover, it keeps me from speeding and I like this fact a lot.

Reviews.Title: Not sure if it entirely works
Reviews.Author: Drake wills
Reviews.Content: First day I got the device I drive around town looking for radar, the police car I saw popped out of no where and I assume he didn't have his radar on. It seems to pick up the local stores as I cruise through town. When I hit city mode it's still beeps through town but not as much.i rolled up on a bike cop very fast the other day and it did not pick him up but he wasn't using his gun he was just stopped. I was comming into traffic and the detector started to go off screaming soon about 200 feet ahead I saw 2 cop cars as I role by the last one the first pulled up right behind me. The detector screamed as he followed me down the freeway but he was literally right behind me.Alot of false reading so far, seems to pick up cameras and speed signs not to far away probably about half to a quarter of a football field.I haven't yet had a situation where I was going down a street and it saved me from a ticket. Meaning it had a positive read and then I saw a cop that was staked out.Pros so far : cheap, good for entry level, low cost budget.Cons: cannot see lights or tell what band is going off. Auto mutes right after it goes off wich can be good but bad in certain situations.I told my self I would give it 2 weeks before I left a review. I will now give it another month before I update this and find out if its work it or not.Thanks for reading and look back to see f this product really works , meaning 1000 feet detection.

Reviews.Title: Radar detector
Reviews.Author: Juanita Prestenbach
Reviews.Content: This detector is perfect for my needs. I mainly use it to maintain a good speed, because I have a heavy foot. This one keeps me on my toes.

Reviews.Title: SO HAPPY WITH THIS
Reviews.Author: logan
Reviews.Content: Was kinda worried about purchasing the lower end radar detector, as I deliver pizzas for a rather large pizza chain, and I cant say I follow all speed limits, but I've seen other cars that were drafting me, get pulled over as I had plenty of warning, yes the occasional false alarm when passing certain locations. And goes of at the red light cameras and the staionary speed limit signs but i like that. all in all 6 stars !!!

Reviews.Author: Amber Satterfield
Reviews.Content: Works great only down side is that when it beeps it starts loud then dies down.  Then I can't hear it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing product!!!
Reviews.Author: Joey Leonard
Reviews.Content: this is an amazing product it does everything i need it to do. when i am on the freeway it detects radar that i cannot see at all. when i pass by the area it is beeping at i see the cop and im totally amazed. this product yes is cheap but is worth the money.! I recommend this product to anyone!!!

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: Cobra ESD7570 9-Band Performance Radar/Laser Detector with 360 Degree Detection works better than i thought it would i love it

Reviews.Title: Pretty Decent for the Price.
Reviews.Author: Dillon Harris
Reviews.Content: This is my first radar detector I bought and was pretty worried about the performance because of the price I got it for. It's been about 3 weeks now and it seems to work just fine for me. It detects the police cars in the area and on the highway. It already saved me 3 times from a ticket. Only thing I don't like about it is that sometimes it is hard to see the display in the daytime. I wish the display could be brighter. Other than that, the sound is great and works well. Remember, it is a radar detector, not a police car detector.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: jon
Reviews.Content: Seems to work. But not sure about the readings it shows on the display. Overall. Was worth the money I spent

Reviews.Title: Excellent product!
Reviews.Author: morgan
Reviews.Content: Very nice! Works great! Couldn't ask for a better performing product for the price! My family and I are thrilled to have it!

Reviews.Title: Radar Detector
Reviews.Author: NJo
Reviews.Content: Seems to work - not very loud, though.  Wish there was a way to increase the volume even more.  I have it set on 10.

Reviews.Title: It didn't work
Reviews.Author: jeffrey s. arnold
Reviews.Content: I don't know how well it works because mine didn't. I have to give it a low rating. QC seems to be lacking at Cobra.

Reviews.Title: So far not good /  UPDATE both are going back!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Silver_diamond2077
Reviews.Content: The screen is so dim you can't make out what is being said or ever if it is turned on. I passed 4 cops today on the freeway and 3 it didn't detect and the other one it only let me know 10 feet away. I asked Amazon for a replacement and will up date this feedback if that one works out.Maybe I just got a dud??*** update 8-28-13Both are dim and both are not very good. I have both units hooked up in my car and one starts flashing KA band and the other X band. I drove by a few cops and both do nothing at all. Only once did both cobras agree and that was as I driving towards a door tonight at a shopping store they flashed KA BAND. KA is only used by police yet they both read KA coming from frys food and drug store???I need to say the 2nd one was a little brighter but not enough to see it in the day time. The 2nd unit picked up a cop tonight drivng un behind me once he was about 20 feet away from my car. How is this going to save anyone a ticket? I drive by photo radars and they don't even go off.I use to own a escort passport along time ago and it always told me of photo radar and cops miles ahead. You guys don't know what your missing.  I wanted this unit to work out because I got it for only $30 after a $5 promo (that i'll lose now) but I guess the saying you get what you pay for is true. I'm going to start saving for a used passport.Save your money and get a real RD. This will only give you false sense of security and that may cost you more money thinking there is no cops around.

Reviews.Title: Very good unit
Reviews.Author: O. Nestor
Reviews.Content: Cobra ESD7570 9this is as I expected and nit surely meets the requirements of me and my wife, not the top of the line but a very good unit.OBN

Reviews.Title: agree with past post
Reviews.Author: C. Ivery
Reviews.Content: light too dim but does the job but not on all radars but still works and keep me from a ticket

Reviews.Title: Ok for the price
Reviews.Author: steve hackney
Reviews.Content: I'm still learning to use it. The only thing I don't like so far is, there's is absolutelly no way your going to see the LED readout in the daytime.

Reviews.Title: Read carefully
Reviews.Author: Aaron McNamara
Reviews.Content: This radar gets the job done.. However! It only gives you roughly a half mile notice before a police cruiser is coming toward you. On some roads, this may be too late. I personally enjoy it because the few encounters where the police had their radars on it gave me a solid warning because there was turns in the road. NOTICE: this radar ONLY picks up police cars when they have their speed radars on. There are many police cars I've seen where it does not alert me simply because they don't run radar in their cars. Hope this helped.Don't let this item promote speeding either. Be careful driving and don't abuse this.

Reviews.Title: Hated it and returned it.
Reviews.Author: R. Rodel
Reviews.Content: I pretty much hated everything about the Cobra ESD7570.  Everybody in my family has a radar detector and this Cobra was pretty disappointing actually. The volume is not loud enough in my opinion even turned up all the way, compared to other detectors, especially the way it steps down the volume after the initial warning. You can barely see any of the indicator lights because they are behind dark grey plastic --and it wasn't even a sunny day. It's so dim you literally can't even tell if it's on or not. The way it shows the radar signal power with three stacks of bars is poor and difficult to interpret especially since it is so dim. When my previous detectors went off going down the highway I could almost always find the cop eventually. I'm really not sure what this one went nuts for a dozen times and I drove about 150 miles trying to test it objectively. I was totally unimpressed. It makes you wonder who designs junk like this anyway. Nobody with any common sense much less any fuzzbuster design experience, that's for sure. I returned it to Amazon and got another Whistler.

Reviews.Title: NOT AS GOOD AS MY OLD  360 ASER THAT DIED.......
Reviews.Author: DIC
Reviews.Content: I WOULD BE HAPPY IF I COULD RETURN THIS COBRA ESD7570THE SOUND LEVEL IS WAY TO LOW CAN'T TELL WHEN IT IS ON DURNING THE DAY WAY TO DIM OF A DISPLAY. SOMETIMES I WONDER IF IT EVEN WORKS,HAVE DROVE BY WAY TO MANY COPS AND NO SIGNAL WAS HEARD. SAVE YOUR MONEY BUY A BETTER MODEL.

Reviews.Title: It sucks!
Reviews.Author: david thelen
Reviews.Content: It doesn't beep when it's supposed to and it's not picking up police cars or emergency vehicles. It only beeps when I'm near a building that has an alarm or other cars. This is my first time using one and I don't know why it's not performing well. My husband put it in city-mode and hwy mode but it still wasn't picking up the correct vehicles.

Reviews.Title: beeps and chirps!
Reviews.Author: Raynor "60% of the time, it works every time!"
Reviews.Content: I have no idea if this really works or not.  Bought it for my wife because she is type A career woman and gets super stressed, so she is dashing around all over the place.  She is going 80mph no matter where she's going!  But this s chirps at random places and forces her to slow down and calm down.  That's a win in my book!

Reviews.Title: I like the Cobra ESD7570 9-Band Performance Radar.
Reviews.Author: Abror B. Zaynutdinov
Reviews.Content: I like the Cobra ESD7570 9-Band Performance Radar. It is budget radar detector which does like other radar detectors. Shipped in excellent condition and fast. I wish to not meet police on my way, but safety first and this device will assist me in this case.

Reviews.Title: bought for husband
Reviews.Author: lg
Reviews.Content: He said it was a good one and liked it. He has not been able to set it completely and is still reading instructions.

Reviews.Title: What do you want for nothing, a rubber biscuit?
Reviews.Author: Captain Nemo "coolusername"
Reviews.Content: it's better than nothing...........what do you expect for 40  bucks...............Cobra ESD7570 9-Band Performance Radar/Laser Detector with 360 Degree...better than nothing

Reviews.Title: replacement
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I ordered this in December and it is only March and it has stopped working.  How do I get a replacement?

ProductInfo.Features:
No-frills unit detects all radar frequencies and laser signals currently used in United States and Canada
VG-2 and Spectre alerts user when they are under the surveillance of a VG2 or Spectre I/IV+ Radar detector-detector
City/ Highway modes allow the user to select operating mode which reduces the frequency of falsing in densely populated urban areas
UltraBright data display provides easy recognition of band detected by use of band identification icons
Safety Alert warns driver of emergency vehicles and road hazards from systems equipped with Safety Alert transmitters
Provides 360 Degree detection of Laser signals
Safety Alert Warns driver of emergency vehicles and road hazards from systems equipped with Safety Alert transmitters.
VG-2 and Spectre Alert, alerts the user when they are under the surveillance of a VG2 or Spectre I/IV+ Radar detector-detectors
ProductInfo.Name: Cobra ESD7570 9-Band Performance Radar/Laser Detector with 360 Degree Detection
